nz.ac.auckland.morc.resource

Class XmlTestResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.auckland.morc.resource.StaticTestResource<Document>
      • nz.ac.auckland.morc.resource.XmlTestResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TestResource<Document>, org.apache.camel.Predicate, org.apache.camel.Processor

    public class XmlTestResource
extends StaticTestResource<Document>
    Provides a mechanism for retrieving XML values from a file/URL/String and also validating a response from a target service.
    Author:
    David MacDonald - d.macdonald@auckland.ac.nz
